member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.Ipp.Retry is used to retry service calls defined in the user retry policy. It enables applications to handle transient errors such as dropped connections. Retries are supported for the following types of exceptions: ProtocolError, ConnectionClosed, ConnectFailure and Timeout.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.Properties.Resources.ArgumentCannotBeGreaterThanBaseline
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified argument {0} cannot be greater than its ceiling value of {1}..

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.Properties.Resources.ArgumentCannotBeNegative
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified argument {0} cannot be initialized with a negative value..

member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.Retry.Properties.Resources.RetryLimitExceeded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The action has exceeded its defined retry limit..
